Reviews.Title: My second purchase
Reviews.Author: Lotecredneck
Reviews.Content: This is the second one of these I have bought. This one was a gift, but my decision to purchase it was based upon my satisfaction with the original one I own. I bought a Nikon D5100 for a gift, but after looking at it and comparing it to my T3i, I returned the Nikon and bought the Canon. The Canon seems to have a better selection of lenses and the focus motor is built in to the camera and not the lens.

Reviews.Title: Very pleased with my purchase
Reviews.Author: Ruby G Baldwin
Reviews.Content: I got this as a Christmas gift you sure can not beat the price for all that you get with this bundle.  I would recommend it highly the camera takes great pictures and very easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Canon EOS Rebel T3i Digital SLR Bundle
Reviews.Author: Scott A. Parker
Reviews.Content: Overall, the budle was OK.  Some items were lower end like the camera bag and tripod but for the most part the main components(camera, lenses, ..., etc.) were good.

Reviews.Title: Bad Ship and Others
Reviews.Author: Herald Souza dos Reis
Reviews.Content: You can find another product with a better priceI bought this product, but it don't arrive for me. I only paid $20 for ship.After this, I searched for others cameras and another tripod, flash, control, etc. I see that kit product don't is a good.I  advise you to seek another better kit than this.
